item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there! I’m Sérgio. I grew up in a small Portuguese island and moved to Lisbon to study Computer Science and Engineering at Instituto Superior Técnico, where I am currently finishing my bachelors. My main interests are machine learning, data science, analytics and visualisation. In my first semester of university, I joined the Board of European Students of Technology where I ended up being in the local board of Lisbon as Vice-President for Internal Support (May 2017 - May 2018).
